Class.name: Telegram.Bot.SendSticker
Class.Description: Use this method to send .webp stickers. On success, the sent Message is returned.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: set .."chat_id" = chatId set ..sticker = sticker set .."disable_notification" = $Get(disableNotification) set .."reply_to_message_id" = $Get(replyToMessageId) set .."reply_markup" = $Get(replyMarkup) return $$$OK
